version_description:
- Reduced enemy hp at low difficulty (easy, normal, hard)
- Decreased mutation growth rate at low difficulty (easy, normal, hard)
- Slight increase in reincarnation compensation at low difficulty (easy, normal, hard)
- Added 6 missions
- Fixed some objects invisible when power saving mode was activated.
- Fixed the ability to see the character's name and description in the store
- Fixed an issue where leaderboards and achievements were not displayed intermittently
- Fixed a problem where cloud function did not work according to the situation

- New characters
- New difficulty
- New upgrade
- New convenience features
- Skill balance rebalance
- Increase the amount of Ruby acquisition at low difficulty level
- Save your data more securely

- Reduced difficulty of first day in Hell difficulty
- Reduced damage of monsters in Hell Levels 1-5
- Change the buildings that have reached the maximum level to be aligned to the bottom of the list
- Hell shop's 'Damage Protection' upgrade increased from 5% per level to 6%
- Maximum wave fixed at 10
- Translation Improvement
- Fixed problem where mute function does not work

Bug fixes
Increase maximum level of 'Enhance'
